comments:
* Create a Java project.
* Create a new class in the project root.
* Annotate the class with 
org.eclipse.jdt.apt.tests.annotations.helloworld.HelloWorldAnnotation.

The root source path has to exclude __generated_src for this to work.

(This use case came from the Beehive Control tutorial. If you use the 
directory structure specified in the sample, Controller.java is located in the 
project root.)
